Player History
Signed as a free agent by St. Louis on 3/3/1987 to a minor league contract.
Injured on 5/16/1988 with a Sore Back, out for one week...
Traded from St. Louis to Atlanta on 5/26/1989 (Going to STL: 3B Bob Horner. Going to ATL: P Graeme Lloyd)...
Traded from Atlanta to St. Louis on 7/5/1990 (Going to ATL: P Dennis Martinez, SS Terry Pendleton, P Mike Hartley. Going to STL: P Cecilio Guante, P Graeme Lloyd, C Javy Lopez)...
Earned first career win on 4/27/1992...
